snippet: A bill passed by the Turkish Parliament gives the police wider latitude to conduct searches and the government greater control over the judiciary.
abstract: Turkish Parliament passes legislation giving police wider latitude to conduct searches, and greater government control over judiciary; critics say the bill can easily be used by government to persecute political opponents.
lead_paragraph: A bill passed by the Turkish Parliament gives the police wider latitude to conduct searches and the government greater control over the judiciary.

headline.main: Turkish Police to Get More Search Powers
headline.print_headline: Turkish Police to Get More Search Powers
